tags.name: HTML
tags.description: Basic calls that provide you with all the necessary HTML to include into your webpage for logging in (sessions), enrolling new users (registration) and logging out (sessions).

tags.name: Sessions
tags.description: Everything about session management and login.

tags.name: Registration
tags.description: Enrolling new users or coupling an exising account to a user.

tags.name: Management
tags.description: Everything for managing the access and authorisations to the servers themselves: permissions, roles and apikeys.

tags.name: Global
tags.description: Everything about global and privileged server attributes. Required permission: global 'servers'.

get.summary: Get all API keys.
get.description: Get all API keys generated by the current role. Required permission: global 'servers'.

200.description: List of apikeys (with role and description)

post.description: Create a new API key. Required permission: global 'servers'.

200.description: Newly created apikey (with role and description)

get.summary: Get all global attributes
get.description: Returns an array containing all global attributes. Required permission: global 'servers'.

put.description: Update the specified global attributes. Prior attributes with keys that are not provided in the body of the request will not be deleted. Required permission: 'servers'.

post.description: Set the global attributes. Prior attributes with keys that are not provided in the body of the request will be deleted. Required permission: global 'servers'.

delete.description: Delete all global attributes. Required permission: global 'servers'.
Delete global attribute with the specified key. Required: global 'servers'.

post.description: Create a new server. Required permission: global 'createserver'.

requestBody.description: Server data (note that serverid, serverpk and validtime are generated by the server)

200.description: Server config for newly created server

requestBody.description: Server data (note that serverid and serverpk cannot be changed)

get.summary: Get all accounts
get.description: Returns all account. Required permission 'accounts'.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter users based on an attribute. Takes the format *attributename=attributevalue*. You can filter for multiple values at once, e.g. *group=in:group1,group2*

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the results by column. You can also specify ascending (default if not specified) or descending, e.g., *column:asc* . You can also sort by multiple columns, e.g., *column1:desc,column2:asc*

get.summary: Visual hash of this server
get.description: Returns a PNG of the visual hash corresponding to this server. This visual hash is used during the registration process (optional), for the user to verify that (s)he is registering with the right server in the nextAuth app. For single-server nextAuth-enabled apps (white label or mobile SDK), the public key of the server is typically pinned within the app and hence this visual hash is not displayed to the user. Required permission: 'sessions' or 'servers'.

200.description: Raw byte array containing the visual hash of this server as a PNG image.

blocked.description: True if the account is blocked, false otherwise

clientVersion.description: Version nextAuth client in the app

description.description: Description of the account (e.g. device name)

canprovoke.description: True if a login can be pushed from the server, false otherwise

hsid.description: Converted session id, used by the websockets

loggedin.description: True if the user is loggedin, false otherwise

loginqrdata.description: Base64 encoded data that is represented in the login qr code

pk.description: Base64 encoded public key of the nextAuth app. This uniquely identifies the account on the nextAuth app, regardless of the username

accountCount.description: Number of accounts registered with this server

appandroid.description: URL of the app in Google Play

appios.description: URL of the app in the App Store

pinTimeout.description: Time (minutes) since the last time the user entered his PIN, that the user is not requested a PIN at login. -1 means that the user is never asked for a PIN before logging in, 0 means that the user is asked every time he wants to login

pinTransTimeout.description: Time (minutes) since the last time the user entered his PIN, that the user is not requested a PIN at transaction approval. -1 means that the user is never asked for a PIN before approving a transaction, 0 means that the user is asked every time he wants to approve a transaction

pingTime.description: Time (seconds) that the nextAuth app has before it needs to reply to a ping request from the nextAuth server (continuous authentication)

serverid.description: Base64 encoded id of the nextAuth server

serverpk.description: Base64 encoded public key of the nextAuth server

api_key.description: API Key for a specific (virtual) server.
api_key.name: X-apikey

role_id.description: ID of the role you want to impersonate (requires that the role associated with the API key passed in the header above has global 'root' or global 'setrid' permissions).
role_id.name: X-su
